title: Pak Images Passed Off as Muslim Man Beating Hindu Wife in India
subtitle: Muslim Man Beating Hindu Wife Viral Photo Fact Check: The viral post claims that she has been beaten up by her Muslim husband despite her attempt to promote harmony.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A collage of two pictures, one of which shows a girl brutally thrashed, has been shared widely on both Facebook and Twitter.

The picture comes with a news clipping which reads that she is one of the girls who kept a fast during Ramzan to promote harmony and peace between Hindus and Muslims.

The viral post claims that she has been beaten up by her Muslim husband despite her attempt to promote harmony.
